FlowDefinition.description: "This is a record triggered flow on account object which is triggered at ctreation and updation of record. with the certain criteria as BillingPostalCode is not null and SDR__c and S__c is not null. Then It is geeting the zip code records based on a formula created in the flow and checking if it is partner account . Based on several criterias it updates the currect account record's OwnerID, AE2, SA, SDR from the zip code object records which match the criterias."
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Account - SDR and Owner Assignment New
